meanings.sent1: She lipsticked her lips before going out.
meanings.sent2: I always lipsticked my lips before important meetings.
meanings.sent3: The clown lipsticked a smile on his face for the show.
meanings.sent4: The artist lipsticked vibrant colors onto the canvas.
meanings.sent5: Her lips were beautifully lipsticked in a deep red shade.

meanings.sent1: The lipsticked tissue left a mark on the glass.
meanings.sent2: She found a lipsticked note in her pocket.
meanings.sent3: The lipsticked cupcake looked too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: The lipsticked mirror reflected her smile back at her.
meanings.sent5: The lipsticked envelope stood out among the others in the mailbox.
